mCtrl/defs.h File Reference

Go to the source code of this file.

Defines

#define MCTRL_API   __declspec(dllimport) __stdcall

Detailed Description

This is helper header included by all the other public mCtrl headers. You should don't need to include this header file directly.

Define Documentation

#define MCTRL_API   __declspec(dllimport) __stdcall

Helper macro specifying the calling convention of functions exported by MCTRL.DLL.
